restriction: The size of each page should be of the format of one Letter (8.5 Ã— 11 in). There should be 2 pages exactly allowed. The content should be prioritized in the cheatsheet should be key concepts, examples. The following features of the crib sheet should make the sheet more comfortable to use, and should be prioritized: Color-coding or highlighting key parts.
